member.name: F:Syncfusion.UI.Xaml.TextInputLayout.SfTextInputLayout.FocusedStrokeThicknessProperty
member.summary: Gets or sets as value to customize the stroke width in focused state, it is applicable for the bottom line and outline border when setting the container type as filled and outlined respectively.

member.name: F:Syncfusion.UI.Xaml.TextInputLayout.SfTextInputLayout.StrokeThicknessProperty
member.summary: Gets or sets as value to customize the stroke width in unfocused state, it is applicable for the bottom line and outline border when setting the container type as filled and outlined respectively.

member.summary: Gets or sets the value for input view to place behind the hint label.

member.summary: Gets or sets the background color of the container.

member.summary: Gets a value for current active color based on input view focus state.

member.value: true if has error; otherwise, false.

member.name: F:Syncfusion.UI.Xaml.TextInputLayout.SfTextInputLayout.CharMaxLengthProperty
member.summary: Gets or sets the length of the maximum character value. When the character count reaches the character maximum length, the error color will be applied.

member.name: F:Syncfusion.UI.Xaml.TextInputLayout.SfTextInputLayout.HelperTextProperty

member.value: true if enable counter; otherwise, false.

member.name: F:Syncfusion.UI.Xaml.TextInputLayout.SfTextInputLayout.ErrorTextProperty
member.summary: Gets or sets the value for validation error. It will be displayed till entering the correct text in the input view.

member.name: F:Syncfusion.UI.Xaml.TextInputLayout.SfTextInputLayout.HelperTextVisibilityProperty
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether to display the helper text. It determines the visibility of the helper text.
member.value: true if show helper text; otherwise, false.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.UI.Xaml.TextInputLayout.SfTextInputLayout.ContainerType
member.summary: Gets or sets a value that determines the appearance of background and its border.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.UI.Xaml.TextInputLayout.SfTextInputLayout.HintVisibility
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether to display the hint text.
member.value: true if show hint; otherwise, false.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.UI.Xaml.TextInputLayout.SfTextInputLayout.InputViewPadding
member.summary: Gets or sets desired padding to override default padding for input view.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.UI.Xaml.TextInputLayout.SfTextInputLayout.FocusedStrokeThickness
member.summary: Gets or sets as value to customize the stroke width in focused state, it is applicable for the bottom line and outline border when setting the container type as filled and outlined respectively.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.UI.Xaml.TextInputLayout.SfTextInputLayout.StrokeThickness
member.summary: Gets or sets as value to customize the stroke width in unfocused state, it is applicable for the bottom line and outline border when setting the container type as filled and outlined respectively.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.UI.Xaml.TextInputLayout.SfTextInputLayout.InputView
member.summary: Gets or sets the value for input view to place behind the hint label.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.UI.Xaml.TextInputLayout.SfTextInputLayout.ContainerBackground
member.summary: Gets or sets the background color of the container.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.UI.Xaml.TextInputLayout.SfTextInputLayout.ErrorForeground
member.summary: Gets or sets the color of the error text, line, and floating label text when setting error.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.UI.Xaml.TextInputLayout.SfTextInputLayout.FocusedForeground
member.summary: Gets or sets the color of the hint label and border when the control is focused.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.UI.Xaml.TextInputLayout.SfTextInputLayout.ActiveForeground
member.summary: Gets a value for current active color based on input view focus state.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.UI.Xaml.TextInputLayout.SfTextInputLayout.HasError
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether it has validation errors. It determines the visibility of the error text.
member.value: true if has error; otherwise, false.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.UI.Xaml.TextInputLayout.SfTextInputLayout.CharMaxLength
member.summary: Gets or sets the length of the maximum character value. When the character count reaches the character maximum length, the error color will be applied.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.UI.Xaml.TextInputLayout.SfTextInputLayout.HelperText
member.summary: Gets or sets a value for helper text in the input view. It conveys the additional information about the text in the input view.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.UI.Xaml.TextInputLayout.SfTextInputLayout.CharCountVisibility
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether to display the character count when the value is changed.
member.value: true if enable counter; otherwise, false.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.UI.Xaml.TextInputLayout.SfTextInputLayout.ErrorText
member.summary: Gets or sets the value for validation error. Error messages are displayed below the input line, replacing helper text until fixed.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.UI.Xaml.TextInputLayout.SfTextInputLayout.HelperTextVisibility
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether to display the helper text. It determines the visibility of the helper text.
member.value: true if show helper text; otherwise, false.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.UI.Xaml.TextInputLayout.SfTextInputLayout.Hint
member.summary: Gets or sets a value for hint text in the input view.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.UI.Xaml.TextInputLayout.SfTextInputLayout.OutlineCornerRadius
member.summary: Gets or sets a value to customize the corner radius of outline border.
member.remarks: It is applicable only when set the container type as outlined.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.UI.Xaml.TextInputLayout.SfTextInputLayout.HintFloatMode
member.summary: Gets or sets a value that determines whether to float the hint label.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.UI.Xaml.TextInputLayout.SfTextInputLayout.LeadingView
member.summary: Gets or sets a value for a view to place before input view.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.UI.Xaml.TextInputLayout.SfTextInputLayout.TrailingView
member.summary: Gets or sets a value for a view to place after input view.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.UI.Xaml.TextInputLayout.SfTextInputLayout.LeadingViewPosition
member.summary: Gets or sets the value that determines whether to place the leading view within the layout.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.UI.Xaml.TextInputLayout.SfTextInputLayout.TrailingViewPosition
member.summary: Gets or sets a value that determines whether to place the trailing view within the layout.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.UI.Xaml.TextInputLayout.SfTextInputLayout.HintLabel
member.summary: Displays floating label.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.UI.Xaml.TextInputLayout.SfTextInputLayout.EdgePadding
member.summary: Gets or sets padding size for the horizontal edges.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.UI.Xaml.TextInputLayout.SfTextInputLayout.IsHintFloated
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the hint was floated.
member.remarks: This property is used to update the control UI based of hint state.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.UI.Xaml.TextInputLayout.SfTextInputLayout.IsHintVisible
member.summary: Gets a value indicating whether the hint was shown or not.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.UI.Xaml.TextInputLayout.SfTextInputLayout.TopPadding
member.summary: Gets the top padding of the input view.
member.remarks: Reserve spaces on top of the input view depends on ShowHint and EnableFloating API when ContainerType as Filled

member.name: P:Syncfusion.UI.Xaml.TextInputLayout.SfTextInputLayout.BottomPadding
member.summary: Gets the bottom padding of the input view.
